content.value:
It has nothing to do with being a conformist. It has everything to do with the fact that hackers are, believe it or not, science driven and able to understand risk. 

What isn‚Äôt very ‚Äúhacker like‚Äù to me is hyping NFT scams. Which is why barely any of us do it.
